page.title: 13A CHILD'S DAY IN EMSWORTH
page.content: I get up at 7.30 and get dressed.When I've eaten my breakfast I go to school which starts at 8.55.We work until 10.00 when we have Assembly.Everyone gathers in the hall and we sing hymns and say prayers.Notices are given out, then we all go into the playground. During break I stay with my friend Jackie.Break lasts for 15 minutes, then we work until lunchtime.Most children have packed lunches,but some have school dinners.It's playtime again until 1.10.In the afternoon we have Drama and Poetry.We have an afternoon break ,then school ends at 3.30. I have my tea,then go to the Sailing Club in Emsworth where I am a junior. We have a sailing night each week when we sail "Toppers"on the millpond or in the harbour.Afterwards we de-rig the boats,have a drink,then go home.
